roleset.name: court ordered prohibition, secret from the media/press
roleset.note: SUPERINJUNCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from superinjunction.01-n)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Conservative MP for Richmond Park Zac Goldsmith took out a so-called super-injunction to prevent the publication of e-mails that had been obtained by hackers and passed to newspapers.
example.arg: to prevent the publication of e-mails that had been obtained by hackers and passed to newspapers

example.name: Arg2, with PRD, ADJ
example.text: The company overreached itself and was forced to withdraw, when it attempted to enforce a so-called "super-injunction" against the Guardian, gagging it from reporting proceedings in the British parliament.?
example.arg: gagging it from reporting proceedings in the British parliament
